item.description:
***Harpoon has ened the Friday night Friend of Harpoon special***

This is the unofficial start of the Annual St. Patrick's Festival Celebration in Boston.

If you like Beer and Great Bands you should attend this party that takes place at the Harpoon Brewery in heated tents. There is no rain date. It goes if it snows too.

Doors open at 5:30 PM and close at 9:30 PM. Event ends at 11:00 PM.

There are no advance ticket sales.

Capacity is limited.

Cover charge is $20.00 and includes souvenir cup and 1 drink ticket. 

Cash Bar is $5.00 per drink.

Irish and other food available for purchase.

Check out the Irish and Rock Bands to perform as posted on line.

We encourage everyone to take the T.

Harpoon Shuttles will be available from The Federal Reserve Building at South Station.

Please visit www.harpoonbrewery.com or call 888Harpoon ext. 3 for more details.

There is a designated driver offer from Harpoon.

Become a Friend of Harpoon today on line.

We expect to be there by 6:30 pm

We will be wearing green.

If you are going and RSVP we will do a followup E Mail the day before the vent.
item.how_to_find_us: E Mail will be sent to RSVPs the day before the event
item.why: This is One of the Best St Patricks events in Boston. The Irish Bands and the Joshua Tree are great, the fresh beer is good too. Expect a huge crowd.
item.name: Harpoon St. Patrick's Festival at Harpoon Brewery
